articles.description: The travel bubble could help repair some of the damage inflicted by the coronavirus pandemic on the cities' hard-hit tourism and aviation industries.
articles.content:
A Boeing 777-312(ER) passenger plane belonging to the Singapore Airlines lands at Hong Kong International Airport on August 01 2018 in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.
